meta.name: description
meta.content: Jasper County is a county located in the U.S. state of Georgia. As of the 2010 census, the population was 13,900. The county seat is Monticello, Georgia.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: jasper county, jasper county news, jasper county board of commissioners, jasper county public safety, commissioners office, government

div.p:
Jasper County Board of Commissioners Office
126 W. Greene Street, Suite 18
Monticello, GA 31064
Telephone: 706-468-4900
Fax: 706-468-4942

section.h3: Please click below to subscribe to Emergency Notifications on evacuations, missing child reports and other information important to your safety.
